name: Duck Heist
description:
You and your crew just pulled off a huge duck heist! Things got a bit too serious at the duck bank and your crew had to bail without you. The back of their van is open and your precious duck loot is going all over the street. Pick up as much as you can and see how far you can get before bank security catches up with you.

Use Ctrl or Mouse to jump.

Made for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) Game Jam. Also my first game ever.
